issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h5.Description

When launching a default project on a Nexus 9 the splashscreen that is shown
is the res-notlong-port-hdpi image, this image appears stretched on the device.

The resolution of the device is 1536 x 2048 and the dpi for the device is 288.

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Create a default project and build to a Nexus 9 device

h5.Actual Result

The splashscreen appears stretched and malformed for the device.

h5.Expected Result

The splashscreen used should not be stretched to fit the device screen.
fields.summary: Nexus 9: Incorrect splashscreen is used on a default project
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.10
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.1.201410281743
Titanium SDK build: 3.4.1.v20141107144118
Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.1-alpha
Nexus 9 (5.0)
